name: PAPER TANKS
description:
The drawings in the notebook came to life and turned into a battlefield!
2.5D tanks in the style of drawings in a notebook.

Game Features:
- 3 types of tanks: heavy, medium, fast. Each tank has its own characteristics.
- A company with over 30 unique levels with a deep storyline.
- Split screen mode (available for the campaign).
- Multiplayer.
- Level editor.
- Bonuses.
